alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 5:43AM PST until December 10 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Ione, Eastport, Clark Fork, Kettle Falls, Metaline Falls, Chewelah, Orin-Rice Road, Athol, Priest River, Metaline, Bonners Ferry, Tiger, Colville, Deer Park, Flowery Trail Road, Fruitland, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Sandpoint, Springdale-Hunters Road, Northport, and Newport. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
